meanings.definition: Causing one to feel extremely tired or drained of energy.
meanings.sent1: After the long hike, I felt so exhausting that I could barely keep my eyes open.
meanings.sent2: Working a double shift at the factory is always exhausting for me.
meanings.sent3: It's exhausting how my cat always wants to play fetch with me, even at midnight.
meanings.sent4: The never-ending meetings at work are like an exhausting marathon for my brain.
meanings.sent5: The scorching sun made the desert landscape look even more exhausting.

meanings.definition: Using up all available resources or possibilities.
meanings.sent1: The exhausting project left us with no time or energy for anything else.
meanings.sent2: The exhausting search for a parking spot in the city always takes forever.
meanings.sent3: It's exhausting how quickly my little brother can finish all the snacks in the house.
meanings.sent4: The exhausting race to the finish line was neck and neck until the very end.
meanings.sent5: The exhausting puzzle required us to use every single piece to complete it.
